node.statement: COMPUTATION OF H_r(lambda_i) VIA CRITICAL POINTS: By definition, H_r(lambda_i) = r''(lambda_i)/(2r'(lambda_i)). Substituting the expressions from Step 1.4.3: H_r(lambda_i) = [n * sum_{k=1}^{n-1} prod_{l!=k}(lambda_i - gamma_l)] / [2n * prod_{k=1}^{n-1}(lambda_i - gamma_k)] = (1/2) * sum_{k=1}^{n-1} [prod_{l!=k}(lambda_i - gamma_l) / prod_{l=1}^{n-1}(lambda_i - gamma_l)]. For each term in the sum, we cancel the factors: prod_{l!=k}(lambda_i - gamma_l) / prod_{l=1}^{n-1}(lambda_i - gamma_l) = 1/(lambda_i - gamma_k), since the numerator is the full product with the k-th factor removed. Therefore H_r(lambda_i) = (1/2) * sum_{k=1}^{n-1} 1/(lambda_i - gamma_k).
